info_messages.welcome_message:
Welcome to ITMO Comp Math lab#1! 
 Author: @melon_egoist 
 Variant: 6 
 Professor: Rybakov Stepan Dmitrievich
info_messages.instruction_message: Here You can see little instruction, how to use this bot: 0. Check /input_format rules! 1. Use /set_file to download your file(optional) 2. Use /set_n to set N value 3. Use /set_matrix to set matrix in bot 4. Use /set_accuracy to set calculating accuracy 5. Use /calculate to use function
info_messages.help_message: Here is the complete command list: /start - check credits, bot info and instruction of bot usage /help - check command list /instruction - check bot usage instruction /input_format - check input format rules /set_file - set your .txt file with matrix data /set_n - set N(matrix size) value /set_matrix - set matrix data /set_accuracy - set your accuracy /check_file - see your downloaded .txt file data /check_n - see your set N(matrix size) value /check_matrix - see your set matrix data /check_accuracy - see your set accuracy /calculate - use this command to calculate asked values /find_roots - use this command to find roots of system of linear equations || root of single equation(lab2) /set_equation - set your equation(lab2) /set_interval - set your interval(lab2)
info_messages.input_format_message:
Please respect theese input format rules: FOR FILES: 游댲File should be given in *.txt format. FOR N INPUT: 游댲N(matrix size) must be given as integer in range[2, 20]. FOR MATRIX INPUT: 游댲Matrix must have N rows and N+1 columns. 游댲Matrix format example: 
a_0 b_0 c_0 d_0 ...
a_1 b_1 c_1 d_1 ...
...
a_n b_n c_n d_n ...

input_messages.set_file_message: Send your file in .txt format: Please, check /input_format for correct usage
input_messages.set_by_file_message: Which type of file do you prefer? 游댲random.txt - file with random data (generate it by /gen_random) 游댲your .txt file - make sure your .txt file is set by /set_file
input_messages.set_n_by_keyboard_message: Please enter here your N in range[2, 20]:

success_messages.set_file_success_message: 游릭 File was set successfully! You can check it by /check_file
success_messages.set_n_success_message: 游릭 N was set successfully! You can check it by /check_n Now you can /set_matrix
success_messages.gen_random_success_message: 游릭 File random.txt was generated successfully! Now you can use it in /set_n and /set_matrix
success_messages.set_matrix_success_message: 游릭 Matrix was set successfully! You can check it by /check_matrix
success_messages.set_accuracy_success_message: 游릭 Accuracy was set successfully! You can check it by /check_accuracy

warning_messages.set_random_warning_message: 游리 Warning! File not found. Please, generate random.txt by /gen_random
warning_messages.set_user_file_warning_message: 游리 Warning! File wasn't downloaded. Please, download your .txt file by /set_file
warning_messages.check_file_warning_message: 游리 Warning! File wasn't download. Please, set file by /set_file
warning_messages.set_matrix_warning_message: 游리 Warning! N wasn't set! Please, set N by /set_n first
warning_messages.set_matrix_wrong_n_warning_message: 游리 Warning! Your matrix N value doesn't equal current N value Please, set another N by /set_n or provide another matrix
warning_messages.missing_matrix_warning_message: 游리 Warning! Your matrix isn't set. Please, set matrix by /set_matrix
warning_messages.missing_accuracy_warning_message: 游리 Warning! Your accuracy isn't set. Please, set accuracy by /set_accuracy
warning_messages.non_diag_matrix_warning_message: 游리 Warning! Diagonal dominance cannot be achieved. Try another matrix...

error_messages.general_error_message: 游댮 Error occured! Sorry, please, try again later...
error_messages.gen_random_error_message: 游댮 Error with random.txt occured! Sorry, please, try again later...
error_messages.set_n_by_keyboard_error_message: 游댮 Error with N input occured! N must be an integer!
error_messages.set_accuracy_error_message: 游댮 Error with accuracy input occured! Accuracy must be a float number!
